metadata.title: What are some of the advantages/disadvantages of writing JavaScript code in a language that compiles to JavaScript?

solution:
var Component=(()=>{var p=Object.create;var r=Object.defineProperty;var h=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor;var u=Object.getOwnPropertyNames;var m=Object.getPrototypeOf,g=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty;var f=(t,e)=>()=>(e||t((e={exports:{}}).exports,e),e.exports),b=(t,e)=>{for(var n in e)r(t,n,{get:e[n],enumerable:!0})},s=(t,e,n,o)=>{if(e&&typeof e=="object"||typeof e=="function")for(let i of u(e))!g.call(t,i)&&i!==n&&r(t,i,{get:()=>e[i],enumerable:!(o=h(e,i))||o.enumerable});return t};var v=(t,e,n)=>(n=t!=null?p(m(t)):{},s(e||!t||!t.__esModule?r(n,"default",{value:t,enumerable:!0}):n,t)),y=t=>s(r({},"__esModule",{value:!0}),t);var c=f((_,l)=>{l.exports=_jsx_runtime});var j={};b(j,{default:()=>x,frontmatter:()=>S});var a=v(c()),S={title:"What are some of the advantages/disadvantages of writing JavaScript code in a language that compiles to JavaScript?"};function d(t){let e=Object.assign({p:"p",h2:"h2",ul:"ul",li:"li"},t.components);return(0,a.jsxs)(a.Fragment,{children:[(0,a.jsx)(e.p,{children:"Some examples of languages that compile to JavaScript include CoffeeScript, Elm, ClojureScript, PureScript, and TypeScript."}),`
`,(0,a.jsx)(e.h2,{children:"Advantages"}),`
`,(0,a.jsxs)(e.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,a.jsx)(e.li,{children:"Fixes some of the longstanding problems in JavaScript and discourages JavaScript anti-patterns."}),`
`,(0,a.jsx)(e.li,{children:"Enables you to write shorter code, by providing some syntactic sugar on top of JavaScript, which ES5 lacks, but ES2015 is awesome."}),`
`,(0,a.jsx)(e.li,{children:"Static types are awesome (in the case of TypeScript) for large projects that need to be maintained over time."}),`
`]}),`
`,(0,a.jsx)(e.h2,{children:"Disadvantages"}),`
`,(0,a.jsxs)(e.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,a.jsx)(e.li,{children:"Require a build/compile process as browsers only run JavaScript and your code will need to be compiled into JavaScript before being served to browsers."}),`
`,(0,a.jsx)(e.li,{children:"Debugging can be a pain if your source maps do not map nicely to your pre-compiled source."}),`
`,(0,a.jsx)(e.li,{children:"Most developers are not familiar with these languages and will need to learn it. There's a ramp up cost involved for your team if you use it for your projects."}),`
`,(0,a.jsx)(e.li,{children:"Smaller community (depends on the language), which means resources, tutorials, libraries, and tooling would be harder to find."}),`
`,(0,a.jsx)(e.li,{children:"IDE/editor support might be lacking."}),`
`,(0,a.jsx)(e.li,{children:"These languages will always be behind the latest JavaScript standard."}),`
`,(0,a.jsx)(e.li,{children:"Developers should be cognizant of what their code is being compiled to\u200A\u2014\u200Abecause that is what would actually be running, and that is what matters in the end."}),`
`]}),`
`,(0,a.jsx)(e.p,{children:"Practically, ES2015 has vastly improved JavaScript and made it much nicer to write. There's more not really a need to use CoffeeScript these days. Instead, TypeScript is the preferred choice because of the added typesafety and improved developer experience it brings."})]})}function w(t={}){let{wrapper:e}=t.components||{};return e?(0,a.jsx)(e,Object.assign({},t,{children:(0,a.jsx)(d,t)})):d(t)}var x=w;return y(j);})();
